languages.text: "Клянусь, что господин Версериан никогда не даровал мне никаких привилегий, не заступался перед командирами и не способствовал росту в чинах. Но... Именно он когда-то убедил меня попробовать стать офицером. И неоднократно наставлял меня в службе, за что я благодарна ему. И, пусть не все мои соратники пользуются таким вниманием, но я знаю не менее дюжины способных офицеров, за судьбами которых господин Сенешаль также следит и помогает не оступиться".

"Lord Captain, I swear that Seneschal Werserian has never granted me any privileges, never once advocated for me, nor facilitated my promotions. Although... He is the man who convinced me to become an officer in the first place. He has offered me extensive guidance in my service, for which I am grateful to him. And while not all my fellows receive such attention, I know of at least a dozen fine officers whom the Seneschal keeps in his sights to ensure that they continue to strive."
languages.original_text: "Клянусь, что господин Версериан никогда не даровал мне никаких привилегий, не заступался перед командирами и не способствовал росту в чинах. Но... Именно он когда-то убедил меня попробовать стать офицером. И неоднократно наставлял меня в службе, за что я благодарна ему. languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich schwöre, dass mir Truchsess Werserian keinerlei Privilegien eingeräumt hat, nie für mich eingetreten ist und keinen Einfluss auf meine Beförderungen genommen hat. Allerdings ... war er es, der mich überzeugt hat, Offizier zu werden. Er hat mich hinsichtlich meines Dienstes beraten, wofür ich ihm sehr dankbar bin. Mag sein, dass nicht alle meine Kameraden eine solche Aufmerksamkeit erfahren, aber ich kenne mindestens ein Dutzend gute Offiziere, die der Truchsess im Auge behält, um sicherzustellen, dass sie ihre gute Arbeit fortsetzen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear that Seneschal Werserian has never granted me any privileges, never once advocated for me, nor facilitated my promotions. Although... He is the man who convinced me to become an officer in the first place. He has offered me extensive guidance in my service, for which I am grateful to him. And while not all my fellows receive such attention, I know of at least a dozen fine officers whom the Seneschal keeps in his sights to ensure that they continue to strive."

Mag sein, dass nicht alle meine Kameraden eine solche Aufmerksamkeit erfahren, aber ich kenne mindestens ein Dutzend gute Offiziere, die der Truchsess im Auge behält, um sicherzustellen, dass sie ihre gute Arbeit fortsetzen."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous jure que le sénéchal Werserian ne m'a jamais accordé le moindre privilège, pas plus qu'il ne m'a pistonné pour m'aider à monter en grade. Cependant... c'est lui qui m'a convaincue de viser un poste de gradée. Il n'a jamais cessé de me guider tout au long de ma carrière, et je lui en sais gré. Et si tous mes homologues n'ont pas la chance de recevoir autant d'attention, je connais une bonne dizaine d'officiers prometteurs sur lesquels le sénéchal veille pour s'assurer qu'ils continuent sur leur lancée. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear that Seneschal Werserian has never granted me any privileges, never once advocated for me, nor facilitated my promotions. Although... He is the man who convinced me to become an officer in the first place. He has offered me extensive guidance in my service, for which I am grateful to him. And while not all my fellows receive such attention, I know of at least a dozen fine officers whom the Seneschal keeps in his sights to ensure that they continue to strive."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je vous jure que le sénéchal Werserian ne m'a jamais accordé le moindre privilège, pas plus qu'il ne m'a pistonné pour m'aider à monter en grade. Cependant... c'est lui qui m'a convaincue de viser un poste de gradée. Il n'a jamais cessé de me guider tout au long de ma carrière, et je lui en sais gré. Et si tous mes homologues n'ont pas la chance de recevoir autant d'attention, je connais une bonne dizaine d'officiers prometteurs sur lesquels le sénéchal veille pour s'assurer qu'ils continuent sur leur lancée. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, le juro que el senescal Werserian no me ha profesado jamás ningún privilegio, nunca ha abogado por mí ni me ha facilitado ascenso alguno. Por otro lado... fue él quien me convenció de hacerme oficial. Me ha ofrecido un sinfín de consejos durante mi servicio, y por eso le estoy muy agradecido. Y si bien no todos mis compañeros recibieron tales atenciones, conozco por lo menos a una docena de oficiales excelentes a quienes el senescal no quita ojo de encima para asegurarse de que continúen medrando en su oficio».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear that Seneschal Werserian has never granted me any privileges, never once advocated for me, nor facilitated my promotions. Although... He is the man who convinced me to become an officer in the first place. He has offered me extensive guidance in my service, for which I am grateful to him. And while not all my fellows receive such attention, I know of at least a dozen fine officers whom the Seneschal keeps in his sights to ensure that they continue to strive."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, le juro que el senescal Werserian no me ha profesado jamás ningún privilegio, nunca ha abogado por mí ni me ha facilitado ascenso alguno. Por otro lado... fue él quien me convenció de hacerme oficial. Me ha ofrecido un sinfín de consejos durante mi servicio, y por eso le estoy muy agradecido. Y si bien no todos mis compañeros recibieron tales atenciones, conozco por lo menos a una docena de oficiales excelentes a quienes el senescal no quita ojo de encima para asegurarse de que continúen medrando en su oficio».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、誓いますが、ウェルザリアン家令長が私に特権を与えたことは一度もありませんし、擁護されたり、昇進を後押しいただいたことも一度もありません。とはいえ…あの方は、そもそも士官になるよう私を説得してくださった方です。あの方は私が勤務する上で幅広い指導をしてくださいました。そのことについては感謝しています。そして、仲間全員がそのような気遣いを受けているわけではありませんが、努力を続けるようにと家令長が常に目を向けている優秀な士官を、少なくとも十数人知っています」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear that Seneschal Werserian has never granted me any privileges, never once advocated for me, nor facilitated my promotions. Although... He is the man who convinced me to become an officer in the first place. He has offered me extensive guidance in my service, for which I am grateful to him. And while not all my fellows receive such attention, I know of at least a dozen fine officers whom the Seneschal keeps in his sights to ensure that they continue to strive."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、誓いますが、ウェルザリアン家令長が私に特権を与えたことは一度もありませんし、擁護されたり、昇進を後押しいただいたことも一度もありません。とはいえ…あの方は、そもそも士官になるよう私を説得してくださった方です。あの方は私が勤務する上で幅広い指導をしてくださいました。そのことについては感謝しています。そして、仲間全員がそのような気遣いを受けているわけではありませんが、努力を続けるようにと家令長が常に目を向けている優秀な士官を、少なくとも十数人知っています」

languages.text: “舰长大人，我向您发誓，韦尔森总领从来没有给过我任何特权，从来没为我出面过，也没有为我的升迁提供任何帮助。不过……当初说服我当军官的人正是他。他为我的职业道路提供了精心指导，我对此感激不尽。尽管并不是所有人都能得到这样的关注，但我知道，确实有几十名优秀的军官得到了总领的持续关注，确保他们会不懈努力，不断前进。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear that Seneschal Werserian has never granted me any privileges, never once advocated for me, nor facilitated my promotions. Although... He is the man who convinced me to become an officer in the first place. He has offered me extensive guidance in my service, for which I am grateful to him. And while not all my fellows receive such attention, I know of at least a dozen fine officers whom the Seneschal keeps in his sights to ensure that they continue to strive."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我向您发誓，韦尔森总领从来没有给过我任何特权，从来没为我出面过，也没有为我的升迁提供任何帮助。不过……当初说服我当军官的人正是他。他为我的职业道路提供了精心指导，我对此感激不尽。尽管并不是所有人都能得到这样的关注，但我知道，确实有几十名优秀的军官得到了总领的持续关注，确保他们会不懈努力，不断前进。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, size yemin ederim ki bugüne dek Seneşal Werserian bana hiçbir ayrıcalık sunmadı. Ne tarafımı tuttu ne de terfi almamı kolaylaştırdı. Gerçi... En başta beni bir subay olmaya ikna eden kendisiydi. Hizmetim için muazzam bir rehberlik sağladı ki bundan dolayı kendisine müteşekkirim. Tüm dostlarım böylesi bir ilgi görmediler elbette. Buna rağmen çabalarını sürdürdüklerinden emin olmak için Seneşal'in gözünü üstünden ayırmadığı en az bir düzine düzgün subay tanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I swear that Seneschal Werserian has never granted me any privileges, never once advocated for me, nor facilitated my promotions. Although... He is the man who convinced me to become an officer in the first place. He has offered me extensive guidance in my service, for which I am grateful to him. And while not all my fellows receive such attention, I know of at least a dozen fine officers whom the Seneschal keeps in his sights to ensure that they continue to strive."
